y z

| 9 |  | prdsvscaval.g | |- ( ph -> G e. B ) |

| 16 |  | #P_fveq1 | |- ( z = G -> ( z ` x ) = ( G ` x ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_oveqan12d | |- ( ( y = F /\ z = G ) -> ( y ( .s ` ( R ` x ) ) ( z ` x ) ) = ( F ( .s ` ( R ` x ) ) ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y = F /\ z = G ) ) -> ( y ( .s ` ( R ` x ) ) ( z ` x ) ) = ( F ( .s ` ( R ` x ) ) ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_mpteq2dv | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y = F /\ z = G ) ) -> ( x e. I |-> ( y ( .s ` ( R ` x ) ) ( z ` x ) ) ) = ( x e. I |-> ( F ( .s ` ( R ` x ) ) ( G ` x ) ) ) ) |
